      • applyConditions

                            int classificationLevel)
                     throws ClassificationLevelException
        Filters relation based on select conditions
        Parameters:
        conditions - select conditions
        classificationLevel - caller classification level
        Throws:
        ClassificationLevelException - cannot specify TC=x where x is greater than callers classification.
